ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Q ) = ( Base ` Q ) |
| 10 | 7 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |

| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` A ) = ( 0g ` A ) |

| 21 | 20 | #P_ad2ant2lr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( U e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) ) -> ( k e. NN0 |-> ( U decompPMat k ) ) finSupp ( 0g ` A ) ) |

| 23 | 8, 9, 6, 5, 11, 12, 4, 13, 19, 21, 22 | #P_gsummoncoe1 | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( U e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( Q gsum ( k e. NN0 |-> ( ( U decompPMat k ) .* ( k .^ X ) ) ) ) ) ` K ) = [_ K / k ]_ ( U decompPMat k ) ) |
